sense.name: send or transfer from one entity (to another)
sense.examples: Within each donor set, only one donor was suspected of having transmitted the disease. The father transmitted the trait to two of his three daughters. Mariner 10 transmitted the first detailed photographs of Venus's atmosphere. What do I do if I transmitted the wrong payment amount? Payment transactions processed on Friday are transmitted the next business day. If a tree falls in the forest and nobody hears it, is information transmitted?

sense.name: serve as a medium for transmission
sense.examples: The material without air transmitted the largest force. They also have transmitted the ability to feel the contour of particular shapes over the Internet.

sense.name: broadcast over the airways
sense.examples: We received a message from the destination station concerning a flight for which a flight plan was transmitted. A sequence system uses a locally generated noise code to encode digital data to be transmitted.
